Hello @ikoevska! Thanks for updating the PR.







 - In the file [`pandas/core/indexes/base.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/db337c18066e3711ea1817030cf60aa4ba33ec7a/pandas/core/indexes/base.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 1159:15](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/db337c18066e3711ea1817030cf60aa4ba33ec7a/pandas/core/indexes/base.py#L1159): [W291](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W291) trailing whitespace
I am closing this one as it got totally messed up after a rebase. Will open a new one with @jorisvandenbossche comments applied.

@ikoevska For future reference, please update this PR. Even if you make a new branch locally, you can force push to the same branch on your fork, and this PR gets updated. But no problem for this time!
